verified_rumors.text: Catherine Aldworth (Heard rumor) whispers that: Ward against the Beast: Chalked circle.
Thomas Clarke (Had a dream) describes a chilling dream: The Beast's appearance: Powerful, barbed tail.

verified_rumors.text: It feeds on the sins of men...
A red cross marks its true name...
The creature moves only at night...
The beast was summoned by dark rituals...
It leaves no trace, only destruction...
It feeds on the sins of men...
The beast was summoned by dark rituals...
The creature moves only at night...
A red cross marks its true name...
It fears running water and iron...
